amendment.description: Amendment provides $162,734,000 for renewable energy projects at VA medical facility campuses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 111-570 to provide $162,734,000 of the amounts appropriated for Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Minor Construction for renewable energy projects at VA medical facility campuses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Buyer amendment (A003) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment as modified make $162,734,000 available for "Medical Facilities".
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Buyer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buyer amendment (A003) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
